thread.title: nancy ketcher
thread.title_full: American RV Company reviewed by nancy ketcher

author: nancy ketcher
title: nancy ketcher
text: I was trying to save money bought a used water heater that I drove 2 hours away from my home my son installed it would only get warm not even warm enough to shower ordered the brand new one after checking prices yours was the cheapest ordered it and received it when promised it works great and I now have plenty hot water
